$comment: This JSON file is a schema for defining a theme for the SpeedCrunch calculator. The theme is used to define the colors of various elements in the expression editor and history view. See more info at https://heldercorreia.bitbucket.io/speedcrunch/advanced/colorschemeformat.html
title: SpeedCrunch Theme

cursor.description: The cursor color in the expression editor

parens.description: Any parentheses. This role defines the text color, both for regular as well as for highlighted matching parentheses.

result.description: The color for the result value in the history view

matched.description: The background color for matching parentheses. When moving the cursor on a parenthesis, both it and its corresponding counterpart will be highlighted by changing their background to this color.

function.description: The names of defined functions, built-in as well as user-defined.

variable.description: The color for the names of any variables or built-in constants

scrollbar.description: The color of the history view's scrollbar

separator.description: Separators; notably, the semicolon (;) used for defining and using multi-argument functions.

background.description: The background color of the main history view

editorbackground.description: The background color of the expression editor
